All 30 Blue Ridge Restaurants» Kentucky Fried Chicken 4860 Appalachian Highway , Blue Ridge , GA 30513 (706) 258-3692 Website Menu Got a photo? Add it. Ranked #30 of 30 restaurants in Blue Ridge 11 Reviews Cuisines: Fast Food Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 11 reviews from our community 27% Recommend Excellent 3 Very good 0 Average 2 Poor 2 Terrible 4 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 11 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any gerigp Cumming, Georgia 2 reviews Reviews in 2 cities 1 helpful vote “Wasre of Time and Money” Reviewed May 26, 2012 We use to stop here sometime and it was good but the last couple of times it was terrible. Today when we stopped there was hardly and food on the buffet. ISilly me I thought when you went to a buffet you didn't have to ask for every piece of food you wanted. There was no chicken, no biscuits, no... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? CorvetteC6 Georgia Contributor 20 reviews Reviews in 13 cities 5 helpful votes “Fried food!” Reviewed April 27, 2012 The buffet wasn't very well kept. It just looked unappetizing because of the way the food was organized. Taste was okay - certainly not impressive. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 2 more reviews by CorvetteC6 for Blue Ridge The_Hungry_Doctor Lawrenceville Senior Reviewer 6 reviews Reviews in 3 cities “It is KFC...” Reviewed April 24, 2012 It was OK... it is a KFC... not a 5-star restaurant. So... if you are looking for quick and cheaper food I guess this is for you. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 3 more reviews by The_Hungry_Doctor for Blue Ridge Robert P Mineral Bluff, Georgia Senior Contributor 39 reviews Reviews in 20 cities 12 helpful votes “Very Slow Service.” Reviewed April 22, 2012 The usual KFC fare, but I find the service to be very slow almost all of the time, especially at lunch time, when you would expect there to be enough help. I think they have management issues. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 6 more reviews by Robert P for Blue Ridge George K Ducktown, Tennessee, United States Senior Contributor 41 reviews Reviews in 15 cities 9 helpful votes “Yuck,just yuck” Reviewed March 18, 2012 Fast food,greasy from a warehouse.And the worse coleslaw on the planet. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 10 more reviews by George K for Blue Ridge yusopup turtletown 1 review “Don't go there” Reviewed March 7, 2012 Mac&cheese was so dry we give it our dog. All of the food was cold. I couldn't tell if the chicken was extra crispy or orginal. Used to like KFC but I won't go back. Don't worry about calling the 800 number, we did and it didn't do any good. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? bbqman3341 Gainesville, Georgia Top Contributor 319 reviews Reviews in 127 cities 1,138 helpful votes “all you can eat kfc” Reviewed August 10, 2011 1 person found this review helpful so what if the sides are less that fantastic, getting all you can eat orginal recipe and crunchy will make this a place you will enjoy coming back to when fried chicken is calling you name. call what you want to, just don;t call me late for supper. this is caravores delight, hot tasty all you want friend chicken. service... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 19 more reviews by bbqman3341 for Blue Ridge bbqman3341 has 1 more review of Kentucky Fried Chicken “Hungry? all you can eat chicken BUFFET” Reviewed October 20, 2008 doggett34778 Blue Ridge, Georgia 1 review “DRIED OUT FOOD” Reviewed June 24, 2011 spent $28.00 on dinner for 3 off the bar. there wasn't much of anything on the bar. we figured anytime more food would come out, but i notice customers requesting what they want, silverware, biscuits, chicken, the tea ran out and no one made any more.when we came in, we ask for chicken, and was told there was chicken out... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? unhappy30559 Mineral Bluff, Georgia 1 review “CONSISTANTLY TERRIBLE” Reviewed December 21, 2010 Ordered three different items they were out of everything after waiting 20 min for them to cook my food and complete my order I got all the way home I find out they still did not get the order correct. so I drive all the way back to the store and show them the order is wrong and that what... More
Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? angelsugar Dallas 1 review 2 helpful votes “Best of the best” Reviewed August 16, 2009 2 people found this review helpful I have eaten at many KFC restaurants across the country. Many with buffets ,some without. This by far is THE BEST! They have a good value and friendly atmosphere. The help genuinely try to accommodate the customer. We have a KFC in the town we live in with a buffet. They can't even begin to compare to the KFC in... More Was this review helpful?
